hero.title: Merchants
hero.subtitle: Stores and merchants that accept Monero as payment.

intro: If you are looking for places to spend your Monero, the directories below provide a comprehensive list of options. Please remember to do your own research before trusting them with your money.

subtitles.bankExit: A map showcasing physical locations where you can spend Monero
subtitles.monerica: A directory for a Monero circular economy
subtitles.kycnotme: Find services that don't require KYC for better privacy and data control

disclaimer: This list is for informational purposes only. The Monero Project does not endorse, recommend, or guarantee any merchant listed here. Always double-check URLs, start with a small test amount if you're unsure, and use every merchant at your own risk.
